entry.string: Xaraya is currently in Beta Production.
entry.translation: Xereya is coorrently in Beta Prudoocshun.

entry.string: If you notice any unexpected functionality, please use our bug tracker at http://bugs.xaraya.com.
entry.translation: Iff yuoo nuteece-a uny unexpected fooncshuneleety, pleese-a use-a oooor boog trecker et http://bugs.xaraya.com.

entry.string: Thank you for your support, and feel free to join our development or user discussions to become involved in our community.
entry.translation: Thunk yuoo fur yuoor sooppurt, und feel free-a tu jueen oooor defelupment oor user deescoossiuns tu becume-a infulfed in oooor cummooneety. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: For more information on Xaraya, please visit Xaraya's website.
entry.translation: Fur mure-a inffurmeshun oon Xereya, pleese-a feesit Xereye's vebseete-a.

entry.string: This message can be edited by creating an override template (#(1)/themename/modules/base/user-main.xt) for the base module.
entry.translation: Thees messege-a cun be-a ideeted by creeteeng un ooferreede-a templete-a (#(1)/themename/modules/base/user-main.xt) fur zee bese-a mudoole-a.
